text: Læa nı hmu mnusʹy bang khn mi phu khearph phakdi tx xallxhˌ bn khxbthang khxng sasna hak khwam di prasb kæ khea khea k phx xk phxcı tx sing nan hak khwam thukkh yak prasb kæ khea khea k ca phin hna khxng khea klab su kar ptiseth khea khadthun thang nı lok ni læa nı lok hna nan khux kar khadthun xyang chad cæng
